wikipedia_page.main: Lindsay Geoffrey Whittle is a Welsh politician. A member of Plaid Cymru, he was an Assembly Member (AM) for the South Wales East electoral region in the National Assembly for Wales 2011–16.

response: On 12 November 2012, Wood announced she would aim to abandon her relatively safe list seat by winning a constituency at the 2016 National Assembly elections; she later confirmed she would contest the Rhondda. Adam Price was subsequently selected as the party's candidate for Carmarthen East and Dinefwr. Lindsay Whittle confirmed he would stand solely in Caerphilly.
*Lindsay Whittle, Plaid Cymru, South Wales East electoral region
